title: Stick Schlepper Surfboard Longboard Carrier Strap Sling
features: Finally! An easy way to carry your long board to the beach!
Comfortable padded shoulder strap with Aloha print.
Shoulder strap adjusts for surfers height and board size
Easy clip on / clip off straps.
Neoprene non-slp pad keeps board in place.
description: Makes carrying your longboard surfboard to the beach a cinch! The stick schlepper is easy to use and extremely lightweight. Get one for yourself and a friend and make the treck to the waves better than ever! Shoulder Pad color is blue and white hibiscus print. The strap can adjust up to a 57" Circumference. This in not a paddleboard carrier. We also make the Big Board Schlepper , a larger strap made for Stand up paddle boards which includes a paddle holder. That one has a 81" strap.

title: FunWater sup carry strap
